name: Fish with Maille® Dijon Originale Mustard
author: Maille
summary: Simply season cod steaks with vegetable oil and Dijon mustard, brown them in a pan, and finish them in the oven, for a simple, foolproof fish dinner.
ingredients: 4  thick cod steaks (or other firm white fish)
directions: Trim fish, then season on both sides
Heat oil in a pan (which can be transferred to the oven
) Fry steaks on one side until crisp underneath
Using a pastry brush, paint Maille® Dijon Originale mustard over the top side of the cod
Place in a pre-heated oven at 400 degrees F for around 5 minutes, depending on thickness
Sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve
